entry.title: AC-10 (mouse brown trivet)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Tablewares
Price: 7.00

Offering functional and organic tablewares with contemporary flare. All of Hamro table top range are made by skilled artisans, making them more special than cheaper alternatives. Soft and beautiful in natural materials and delightful colour tones, this ball trivet will protect table and counters from hot dishes, pans and casseroles while adding fun and beauty to dinning room table.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: Spot-clean with damp sponge and soap or with a textile stain remover. Hand-wash using soap and scrubbing gently. Remove excess water without twisting and hang or dry flat. Do not machine wash.

dimension: 7.5” x 5" 

 

Please be aware that actual colours may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
